title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 83.2 - Exterior signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 83.2 - Exterior signs

State Regulations

No sign, as defined in subdivision (a) of section
83.1
of this Part, shall be
erected, installed or displayed on the exterior of any retail licensed premises
by the retailer; provided, however, that this section shall not apply to
premises licensed to sell beer at retail for consumption off the
premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
83.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
